availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joab Clark (Christian Co, KY, Clerk of Circuit Court)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, farmer and circuit clerk. Christian County native. Married to Mary "Polly" A. Clark. Father of Harriett C. Clark, Volney C. Clark, Hosea B. Clark, Aurelia C. Clark, Sebastian S. Clark, Albert Hawes Clark, Elizabeth Clark, Victoria Clark, Ellen N. Clark, and Josephine Clark. Married to Nancy Brasher Clark in Christian County, Kentucky, on December 18, 1853. Father of Joab Clark and Mary Clark. Farmer in Christian County in 1850. Farmer in Christian County in 1860. Clerk of the Christian Circuit Court in Christian County from 1861 to 1866.
